alert.note: Alert for Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 23 at 9:05AM EST until January 24 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures near 30 degrees possible with frost. * WHERE...Inland St. Johns, Inland Flagler and South Central Duval Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
